Material used.Material Name: Brain tissue from A53T mutation carriers
Material used.Description: Immunohistochemical analysis was performed on brain tissue from patients with the A53T mutation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Accelerated fibrillization of a-syn and tau proteins
Readout description.Result Description: Accumulation of insoluble filamentous a-syn and nitrated a-syn was observed in A53T mutation carriers. Filamentous tau protein accumulation was also noted.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Absence of insoluble filamentous a-syn and tau proteins

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of insoluble filamentous a-syn and tau proteins

Material used.Material Name: Brain tissue from A53T mutation carriers
Material used.Description: Biochemical analysis was performed on brain tissue from patients with the A53T mutation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased fibrillization of a-syn and tau proteins
Readout description.Result Description: Quantification of insoluble a-syn and tau proteins showed elevated levels in A53T mutation carriers compared to controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal levels of insoluble a-syn and tau proteins

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Elevated levels of insoluble a-syn and tau proteins

Material used.Material Name: Brain tissue from A53T mutation carriers
Material used.Description: Ultrastructural analysis was performed on brain tissue from patients with the A53T mutation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Formation of pathological aggregates in a-syn and tau proteins
Readout description.Result Description: Ultrastructural analysis revealed the formation of pathological aggregates and filamentous structures in A53T mutation carriers.
